text: 14.3 Mak 16.20, Apo 19.11, Hib 2.4 Pen Pol ayɨp, Banabas ayɨp takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, man anɨb ak ma kelɨg amnɨlek. Mɨdɨlɨg, Bɨawl chɨnop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gup agɨl, takaw teplep anɨb ak kɨles gɨl monmon agñelɨgɨpil. Pen God kɨlop omɨŋal kod mɨdaknɨŋ, tap mageptek okok gelek, binɨb okok nɨŋɨd, takaw agebil anɨb awl, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebil agɨl nɨgɨlak.
